docs.lead_paragraph: Crossroads Britney Spears, Zoë Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd Directed by Tamra Davis PG-13 97 minutes A perfectly turned-out butterscotch-blond product named Lucy (Ms. Spears) is feeling a little low after being valedictorian at her high school graduation. Is that all there is? Ambitious for his daughter, Pete (Mr. Aykroyd) pushes a medical career. That's certainly doable, but Ms. Spears's Lucy naturally leans toward pop stardom.

headline.main: After High School, Where? Let's Hit the Road and Sing!

docs.abstract: Peter Nichols reviews movies Crossroads, Return to Never Land and John Q, focusing on their suitability for children; photo (Taking the Children column) (M)
